commitResults.messageTitle: -Skeletal version of the program that echoes input, unless input is "bye" of any combination of upper/lower case letters, then program terminates and does not respond to further inputs
-changed local variable, "curr" to "currentLine" -added documentation

- changed approach to identifying keywords, from "toLowerCase()" to "equalsIgnoreCase" - inputs are now treated as valid commands for adding tasks, unless it is keyword for termination - added methods to support storing of things to be done
- added documentation for relevant methods
- added documentation
- added Task class - tasks can now be marked as completed or incomplete
- added documentation
- added features to handle possible wrong inputs - modified messages displayed
- modified program to only accept certain inputs and prompts user to key in the correct way - added features to handle some possible wrong inputs
- added documentation - modified code for better flow - tweaked error handling for invalid inputs
- input like "done1" are no longer accepted, spaces are expected
- modified spacing issues with printed strings
- fixed error when calling list when it is empty
- corrected typo
- updated input and expected txt files
- tweaked dialog prompts for different types of tasks
- added feature to delete tasks - added method to display commands to help with user input
- added documentation
- corrected 'date' to 'deadline' in dialog prompt - corrected '<Event>' to 'event' and '<Deadline>' to 'deadline' in dialog prompt - reorganized sequence of dialog prompts - tested some more cases
- changed some method implementation such that enum is part of the implementation of the program, enum 'Command' and method 'doSomething' - added documentation - tweaked dialog prompts
Add Level-7 features Update approach to detecting user input
Add Level-8 Update attribute of Event and Deadline to store LocalDate or String or both
Update approach to identify user input Update organization of code, split into various java files
Update organization of tiles by packages
Add various Junit tests for corresponding methods
Add documentation to most public methods and fields
Update code style to match coding standards
Add FindCommand Update Parser and TaskList to support find
Update various files to match coding standards
Update java documentation and method names TaskList: adding and correction of java documentation, changed method name Task: correction of java documentation
Delete text-ui-test/New folder directory
Delete src/data directory
Remove unnecessary files Deleted various .class and .txt files for local tests
Update FIndCommand added missing java documentation removed isExit() method

Add Gradle to project Updated ParserTest, TasksTest and CommandsTest for automation of Junit Tests. Included tests for instances of FindCommand in ParserTest and CommandsTest. Organized import statements in above mentioned files.
Update Gradle and Ui File path for duke is updated. Additional dialogue added for helperMessage in Ui.
Add Gui to Duke Updated various java files to return String as representation of outcome of different executed tasks. Updated Ui to store and return standard messages.
Update various files according to Checkstyle
Update DukeApp removed unused class field.
Update README.md
Update README.md
Update README.md
Update README.md
Update README.md

Update various files for correct java documentation format and user prompts class members are changed to single line representation in various java files missing java documentation added in TaskList name for parameter for constructors in subclasses of Command changed to "userInput"

Update various files' parameter names and Ui * changed single character parameter names to more descriptive words like "userInput" and "description" *  corrected display error in Ui, where "tasks.Task" was shown instead of "Task" *  changed method name from "getTask" to "getDescription" and relevant changes in related files
Update various files * added assert feature to all the update files in this commit except Task and ToDoTask * reorganized code in DeleteCommand for better readability

Update various files code quality * removed unnecessary "this" and "super" in subclasses of Task and Command * changed "lst" to "list" for parameters of command classes' "execute" method * organized code in DeleteCommand for better readability
Update TaskList * changed implementation of how to find relevant tasks in findTask and findTasksDue to use stream

Update DoneCommand, Task and TaskList * added assert in DoneCommand * changed setIsDone in Task to return String instead of printing * corrected error in using stream in method findTasksDue in TaskList
Update DueCommand * corrected for undeclared local variable
